title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Cloud to AI Securing the New Cloud Attack Surface (SEC220)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从云到 AI：保护新的云攻击面 (SEC220)
abstract: AI adoption marks the next generation of cloud innovation and it’s reshaping the attack surface. Shadow AI projects, new control planes, and sensitive data pipelines are converging with traditional cloud misconfigurations and identity gaps. This session shows how Wiz helps organizations secure both cloud and AI by surfacing risks in context from S3 pipelines to SageMaker models and unifying ASM and AI-SPM to give teams the visibility, context, and confidence to act. This presentation is brought to you by Wiz, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: AI 采用标志着云创新的下一代发展，正在重塑攻击面。影子 AI 项目、新的控制平面和敏感数据管道正在与传统的云配置错误和身份差距融合。本次会议展示了 Wiz 如何帮助组织保护云和 AI，通过在上下文中显示从 S3 管道到 SageMaker 模型的风险，并统一 ASM 和 AI-SPM，为团队提供可见性、上下文和采取行动的信心。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Wiz 为您呈现。
